title: Ranked 5's
body: What happened to Ranked 5's and are riot planning to bring it back because flex is so trash compared to it

replies.body:
theres a video Riot released talking about the future of ranked 5's.

They want to bring in like a tournament style 5v5 que, where you play against 3-4 teams in a league.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pFwrySPCff8&t=205s
They dropped ranked 5s for flex. At this point they aint gonna swap them back.
